seo_content:
Exclusive FundedNext Trading Offer

FundedNext, based in the United Arab Emirates, was established in March 2022. The firm is a CFD provider offering 1 Step and 2 Steps program types. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include cTrader, MT4 and MT5. Tradable instruments include Forex, Commodities and Indices, with leverage options up to 1:100 for majors, exotics, and cryptocurrencies. FundedNext has a 4.6/5 review score based on 14,350 reviews. confirmed by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: FundedNext Promo Code: Check website Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with FundedNext using our exclusive discount code. validated for the current trading season.
